pages.text: Like a caveman, you've always run around manually illuminating, or closing, unsightly looking cave exits in your immediate vicinity. To relieve you of this work you took the self-replicating abilities of Fading as inspiration to develop the Block Flooder.$(br)Thrown into a cave entrance, pond or ravine, they are filled - in 5% of the cases the result even looks acceptable!

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Pulls matching blocks to close the gaps directly from your inventory. If you don't have any matching blocks it will fall back to Cobblestone.
